successes.title: Lumio: A Modern Lamp With Infinite Possibilities
successes.description: Lumio unfolds from a book into a multi-purpose portable lamp. Transform Lumio into many shapes to meet your needs!

Pledges.description: BE A FAN: Join the Lumio community to receive updates + a thank-you tweet.
BOOKMARK IT: You'll receive a custom laser cut bookmark with Lumio crest engraving.
LUMIO TOTE BAG: Special edition tote bag to carry your Lumio and other goods around town.
SWAG BAG: Get a Lumio tote bag + a notebook + a custom engraved bookmark.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Get a special $10 off for being the first 100 backers! ($125 retail value). Wood cover finish options: Blonde Maple, Warm Cherry and Dark Walnut.
FIRST BATCH LUMIO: Be the first group to receive Lumio! ($125 retail value). Wood cover finish options: Blonde Maple, Warm Cherry and Dark Walnut.

SECOND BATCH LUMIO: Quality comes first so we want to limit our first delivery to make sure you get the best product! ($125 retail value). Wood cover finish options: Blonde Maple, Warm Cherry and Dark Walnut.

THIRD BATCH LUMIO: Due to popular demand, we are limiting our 2nd batch to ensure timely delivery. Sign-up for the 3rd batch to get your Lumio before the Holidays! ($125 retail value). Wood cover finish options: Blonde Maple, Warm Cherry and Dark Walnut.
LUMIO SET: Get one Lumio Lamp & our swag bag (tote bag + notebook + bookmark). Wood cover finish options: Blonde Maple, Warm Cherry and Dark Walnut.
LIMITED EDITION LUMIO: Get one Lumio with limited edition cover (custom engraving of your name - limit up to 25 characters). Wood cover finish options: Blonde Maple, Warm Cherry and Dark Walnut.

GUIDED RUN OF SF WITH MAX + LUMIO: Enjoy scenic run tour of San Francisco with Lumio founder, Max Gunawan. He'll take you through his favorite run trails in the city and you'll get to take home a Lumio lamp with you. [Airfare/transportation not included]

LUMIO WORKSHOP WITH MAX + LUMIO + SF CULINARY TOUR: Spend a day with max in Techshop SF to learn laser engraving and bring home a custom Lumio lamp. Max will take you to Blue Bottle for coffee in the morning and sample SF's finest produce at the Ferry Building for lunch. [Airfare/transportation not included]

WEEKEND GETAWAY WITH LUMIO: Enjoy a luxurious weekend camping trip and experience Lumio in the wilderness with modern comfort within reach. You will bring home a custom Lumio lamp with engraving. [Airfare/transportation not included]
